about_the_game:
Now you can play Guts and Glory IRL!*


Download the Guts and Glory Original Soundtrack today and make your ear-holes moist with 32 tantalizing tunes.

From Zoe's speed metal tracks to Earl's country melodies, there's something for everyone.

No game install required, so you can even copy the files to your phone and listen to them on the go.

Full track list:

1. Guts and Glory Main Theme
2. All American Bad Ass
3. Breakin Ankles
4. Fearless
5 Speed Metal Mayhem
6. Cruiser
7. Industrial Cowboy
8. Creepy Motel
9. Road of Your Dream
10. Ride Around Town
11. Roarin Good Time
12. Just a Casual Day
13. Learning
14. Pep in Your Step
15. Strange Family
16. Story Book Time
17. Saturday Morning Cartoons
18. Family Field Trip
19. Syncope
20. Sundae Reggae
21. Clockwork Princess Carnage
22. Psychedelic
23. Funk It
24. the Streets
25. Throwback
26. Pedro Man of Legend
27. Mariachi Life
28. Mexican on the Run
29. Treacherous Trail
30. Finish Line
31. Dreams of Glory
32. Timeless Hero

Get your Glorious Soundtrack today and support HakJak in making more weird and wonderful games and updates :D

*Please do not attempt to recreate Guts and Glory games in real life, as this will likely result in something terrible happening.

Now you can play Guts and Glory IRL!*


Download the Guts and Glory Original Soundtrack today and make your ear-holes moist with 32 tantalizing tunes.

From Zoe's speed metal tracks to Earl's country melodies, there's something for everyone.

No game install required, so you can even copy the files to your phone and listen to them on the go.
